Text.Value: Hells, it's all coming down!
Hells, this place is on the verge of collapse.
Tsk'va - the whole place is coming down!
Hells, the entire place is collapsing!
Gods, the building's on the verge of collapse!
Brace yourself, the walls are falling down!
The whole structure is collapsing!
Oh gods, the whole building is collapsing...

EditorData.NodeContext: Building is starting to collapse around you.

Text.Value: Well don't just stand there gawping - get me out of here!
Help! Get me out of this thing, before the whole place collapses!
Hello, a little help here?
No no no. Release me, before that thing detonates!
Bloody hells - get me out of this thing! Hurry!
I'm not one to ask favours, but - get me out of here!
Help! Get me out of this thing before the whole building collapses!

EditorData.NodeContext: Character realises they're trapped and the building is about to come down

Text.Value: Don't worry your pretty little head, I'm sure there's a way out of this.
Hold on - we need an exit from this chamber as well.
Don't worry, soldier - I'm on it.
Another complication. Keep your wits - there must be a way out.
Hold on - we need to get clear of this chamber as well.
Traps within traps. There's got to be a way out.
Hang on, we need to find a way out of this chamber as well!
This... isn't good. How do I get out?
Better get out of here.
Better get out of here quick.
No no no. I get out of here - now!
Not good. I need to get out of this thing - now.
This isn't good. I've got to find a way out.
I need to get out of here!
Run, before it buries us here!
Let's get out of here!
Move it. And hurry!
We need to move. Now.
Time to go - now!
Let's move!
Time to get clear of this place.
Let's get out of here!
I need to get out of here.
Tsk'va! I need to get out of here.
Hells, I need to get out of here.
I should get out of here - fast.
By Balduran's blade, I need to get out!
Shit, this isn't good. I need to get out!
I need to get out of here!
Hells, I need to get out of here.
I'll get them free - you find a way out of here!
Hells, can't just leave them in there - someone do something!
I'll get them out - you look for a way out!
I'll work on the barrier. Someone, find the way out of here.
I'll get you out - but someone else needs to get us out of here.
Traps within traps. There's got to be a way out.
There must be a way to get them out. Someone else find a way out of here!
Run, before it buries us here!
Time to run.
Move it. And hurry!
We need to move. Now.
Time to move.
We need to move - NOW!
We need to be gone from here - now.
We need to run. Now!

Synopsis: A player gets trapped inside the barrier. If there are other companions nearby, they comment that they need to find a way out or deactivate the machine.
